profile.bio: Dr. Tayfun "Typhoon" Keskin holds a Ph.D. degree from The University of Texas at Austin, McCombs School of Business, along with a masters (M.Sc.) in Information, Risk, and Operations Management, and an MBA. His undergraduate is from Boğaziçi (Bosphorus) University in Electrical and Electronics Engineering.   After completing his diploma collection, he joined University of Washington Bothell, Business Program and witnessed its transformation to the UW Bothell, School of Business.
